lead_paragraph: LINTS--Rasjad Kenton, born February 5, 1954, died January 9, 2016 in Vancouver, WA. Renowned pediatrician, Associate Medical Director, lover of airstreams, runner, outdoorsman and committed husband and father. Donations and memorial service on February 6, 2016 will be announced on his blog www.a- life-beyond-measure.com. 1/3
